snippet.title: Sticks & Stones Candy Bark
snippet.description: Sweet and salty Sticks & Stones Candy Bark makes a great treat.

snippet.title: Golden Pound Cake
snippet.description: While pound cake is named after the original weight of its ingredients—a pound each of flour, butter, sugar, and eggs—most modern recipes do not follow these measurements. Traditionally baked in a loaf pan, this tender, fine-textured cake has many flavor variations, including lemon, orange, and coconut. This delectable version is scented with mace and topped with chopped nuts. For a special touch, dust the top with powdered sugar just before serving.

snippet.title: Cookie On A Stick
snippet.description: This Cookie On A Stick recipe is perfect to collaborate on with your kids -- As much fun to make as they are to eat. Let the creative juices flow! Also a great idea for a holiday cookie!
